pattern.desc: The DB_Connection pattern should be used to represent a RDBMS. After cloning, the Database node needs to be deployed appropriately using the 'Advanced Deployment' options. The easiest option to set up a database connection is to use the 'Create Connection' option available through the RuleMaker SQL operator, rather than cloning this pattern directly.
pattern.name: workflowdb.xml

node.desc: The Database node provides a design time representation of the actual database that will be used at runtime.
node.name: Database
